properties.tune: Here Comes the Sun - The Beatles
properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 v4 v5

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Here comes the Sons, do do do do Here come the Sons, And I say - - Let's fight!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Count Christian, it' s been a long, cold, lonely winter Tiger Lad, it seems like years since we' ve been here

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Obadiah, I see the blood is amply flowing Swanman, it feels like years since I killed a peer

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Sons, Sons, Sons, here they come Sons, Sons, Sons, here they come Sons, Sons, Sons, here they come Sons, Sons, Sons, here they come

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Beerslayer, we see that they have been retreating Lord Corwin, it seems like years since we've been feared

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Sons, Sons, Sons, here they come Sons, Sons, Sons, here they come
